title: Mickey Brown, Inc Recalls Beef Burrito Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: EDITORS NOTE: This release was updated on March 22, 2018 to reflect additional poundage produced. WASHINGTON, March 20, 2018 Mickey Brown, Inc., a Houma, La. establishment, is recalling an undetermined amount of beef burrito products that were produced without the benefit of federal inspection, the...
